subject: Problem when installation of a last version  “junit4.9b2”!!
msgSnippet: Problem when installation of a last version junit4.9b2 !!  I have install in the C: TOOL_TEST JUnit junit4.9b2 ... exit. ... Is possible help me,  Thank
messageBody:
Problem when installation of a last version "junit4.9b2"!!

 I have install in the C:\TOOL_TEST\JUnit\junit4.9b2

 This is my set enviroment for CLASSPATH:

>C:\TOOL_TEST\JUnit\junit4.9b2\junit4.9b2.jar;C:\TOOL_TEST\JUnit\junit4.9b2\org;C:\TOOL_TEST\JUnit\junit4.9b2;C:\TOOL_TEST\JUnit\junit4.9b2\javadoc;C:\TOOL_TEST\JUnit\junit4.9b2\junit\tests
>s
>
>
>  But when  I lunch
>
>  java org.junit.runner.JUnitCore org.junit.tests.AllTests
>
>
>  the response is:
>
>  java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: org/junit/runner/JUnitCore
>  Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: org.junit.runner.JUnitCore
>         at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source)
>         at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method)
>         at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source)
>         at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
>         at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
>         at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
>  Could not find the main class: org.junit.runner.JUnitCore.  Program will
exit.
>  Exception in thread "main"
>

Is possible help me,

 Thank you Emanuela
